title: Huge Sunny 2br. 5 min to T. 15 min to Bos.
posting_body: Take a look at what the city of Malden/ Nearby Somerville Assembly Row has to offer at:
Available: Now
Walk to Malden Center
Malden Ctr T(ORANGE LINE)
Oak Grove T (closest to property, 5 min walk)
Commuter rail
Couple of stops to Assembly Row Shopping, Movies, Dinning, etc
Minutes to Assembly row: Great restaurants, Shops, Gym/ Fitness ctr.
<URL>/
<URL>/
<URL>/
<URL>/
2 Bedroom apartment in a beautiful Victorian.
Entire apartment is in Great shape, Bamboo hardwood in kitchen.
Has new refrigerator, new stove, and disposal in new kitchen.
All original woodwork, nook storage, and plenty of closet space.
Next to a 200-acre conservation park, Pond, tennis courts, supermarket, Rt's.
Walk 5 minutes to Oak Grove Train station (Orange line & Commuter).
15 minutes to Downtown Boston.
*Fresh walls.
*Bedrooms are good size with huge closets.
*Washer Dryer in unit
*Huge eat in Kitchen with new floor and appliances.
*Plenty parking.
*Walk to T
NO PETS
NO SMOKING/ NO VAP/ E-Cig (on premises, apartment)
This is a Quiet building
*This apartment is not affiliated with any realtor service.
No Solicitations, and please stop sending sales/ marketing email.
If you are not
getting response, you are probably going to Spam mail.
